title: Triumvirate
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307081617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Triumvirate**

The three essential books that should be the basis of every [type designer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307081617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/type%20designer)'s/ [typographer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307081617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/typographer)'s library - one of the few things that [Hrant Papazian](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307081617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hrant%20Papazian) and [Thomas Phinney](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307081617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Thomas%20Phinney) ever agreed on:

[The Elements of Typographic Style](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307081617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Elements%20of%20Typographic%20Style) by [Robert Bringhurst](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307081617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Robert%20Bringhurst)  
 [Anatomy of a Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307081617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Anatomy%20of%20a%20Typeface) by [Alexander Lawson](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307081617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Alexander%20Lawson)  
 [Letters of Credit](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307081617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Letters%20of%20Credit) by [Walter Tracy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307081617/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Walter%20Tracy)
author: Thomas Phinney
